title: Introducing: bülow
content:
Released at the tail end of last year with relatively little fanfare, the debut EP from seventeen year old Dutch pop powerhouse in waiting bülow has become one of the most buzzy projects of recent times, not least for the brilliance of lead single, Not A Love Song, which has clocked up four and half million streams on Spotify already.

Merging elements of Lorde and Sigrid, there’s a real youthful and playfulness to the EP that makes it so deliriously addictive. Check out Not A Love Song below, alongside the new video for another EP track, Lines. Try telling me this isn’t the true sound of 2018.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
